page.title: 11A DAY IN SCHOOL LIFE-SUDBURY
page.content: In the morning Mrs Thorpe the{care- {taker}turns on the boilers and puts down the chairs. Then Miss Powell, the{head-teacher,}comes in and starts to open the mail. Then the school-bus, Mrs Woolley in her car and Miss Taylor arrive at the same time. The{children play outside then sit down for {assembly.}Next they go to their own {class rooms.}At 10.30am they go out to play then work again till 11.45 when they go for{dinner.}They come back from dinner at 12.15. The juniors go in at 12.30, the infants at 1.00. Then it's work until 2.00 when they go out to play for the last time that day. Afterwards they tidy away,then if time they read a story. The children go home at 3.00 and the teachers tidy up. Then they go home. Finally Mrs Thorpe comes in and cleans and locks up.
